name: Toby and the robot: a short adventure game
name_original: Toby and the robot: a short adventure game
description:
You play a robot called Toby. After falling out of the skies, you get up into a place where a gigantic robot is lying on the ground. You decide to cross over the world around you in order to save him.

Notes:
I haven't tested the game on Linux and MacOS so there might be some bugs, don't hesitate to report them to me.
On android, you may get a warning message from play protect. Don't worry, there is no virus. It's just that Google doesn't know the developer rom100main.

Credit:
Developer: rom100main
Graphics: luzartwork
Sounds: Flo-x
Others: WatamyT

Version: 1.0.0
Engine: Godot
